name: Triple Can Interface
short_description:
Project is CANbus interface intended to interface with three CAN buses simultaneously.  Code is expected to include 2 or more 'branches' to provide different types of functionality - The first being simply a logger that sends the information to a PC where a simple program will save the data to a file.  The second will allow the device to function as a standalone interface between the vehicle and a permanently mounted PC, performing functions as needed.

The specific purpose serving as an impetus to the project : to allow an automotive dash-mount PC to perform all needed functions previously performed by the AV/Nav unit, thereby allowing that unit to be replaced without significant loss of functionality.
